description: Pioneers is a Math club that aims to be a dynamic platform that will provide resources to learn, explore experience and engage with Mathematical ideas.
tasks: Worked with a great team of brilliant mathematicians and science enthusiasts.
Played an integral part in organizing our School's Successfull Attempt to achieve the Official Guinness World Record of "The Largest Human Image of an Infinty Symbol" (998 participants).

Conducted math competitions and workshops for students, assisted other instructors in constructing lesson plans and understanding lesson material, and interacted heavily with parents regarding student projects and progress.
